text: Ofa gamir gumaziba ko gumazir igharazir kaba, sɨghabar suigha dagh ivi. Ofa gamir gumazibar ziabar kara: Eliakim, Masea, Miniamin, Mikaia, Elioenai, Sekaraia, ko Hanania. Gumazir igharazibar ziabar kara: Masea, Semaia, Eleasar, Usi, Jehohanan, Malkia, Elam ko Eser. Ezɨ Jesrahia gumazir ighiabagh amibar gara men faragha zuima, me bar pamtem deravɨra ighiabagh ami.
